value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's wrong, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, I just feel so bad... I didn't think
Eitri was the sort of person who
would do something like this.$k$pI'm so sorry! At this rate, I'm afraid
$Nu will—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-it'll be all right! If any can handle
this, $Nu can!$k$p$EFace|PLUS, all thanks to Eitri's deceit,
we now have two strong new allies
in Princess Nótt and Princess Dagr!$k$pSo thing's aren't all bad after all.
...Right, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Yes, I suppose that is one way
you could frame the situation.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Aw, c'mon, Alfster! Don't look
so glum! All we need to do is
stop one tiny girl.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I could handle her myself! I nearly
stopped all of you, so what's one
little girl going to do, hm? *wink*$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*sigh* Dagr... Try exercising your
brain for once. At least...try.$k$p$EFace|That "little girl" is making something
and aiming to rival the summoner.
That news should trouble you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's why she snatched both it
and $Nu!$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Er, but wait... What does she need
any of that for?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm... It's strange...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Go on, Commander Anna...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Well, I checked out the Heroes we
encountered, and all of them were
summoned over five years ago.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Really? That long ago?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|That means Eitri hasn't done any
summoning lately...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Right. But it seems like she suddenly
has a renewed interest.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Could it be connected to my
brother in some way?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That is definitely a possibility.
Can you think of any way that
might be true?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Umm... Hang on... I think I'm
remembering something...$k$p

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Umm... Uhh...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Keep trying to remember, Princess
Reginn—but we also need to move
to save $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course! I'll do what I can to help!$k$p$Sbs1000|
